title: SYMHC Classics: April Calahan on France's Fashionable Resistance
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: April Calahan on France's Fashionable Resistance
description:
Today we're revisiting a talk with fashion historian April Calahan about the surprising ways that women of France protested German occupation during WWII.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
